name: 亻
mnemonic: This is how kanji for human evoluated from this radical: 人 → 亻

name: 亅
mnemonic: "This radical is shaped like a barb, like you'd see on barb wire, or something. Imagine one of these getting stuck in your arm, and think about how much it would hurt to pull it out with that hook on the end.

name: 大
mnemonic: This radical looks just like a stick figure - more specifically, a really big dude stick figure. When you see this radical, just think big because this guy is really BIG!

name: 時
mnemonic: The sun is used in the temple to tell time. Clocks aren't allowed in sacred places like this!, Go see where the sun falls in the temple. That's how you know that time it is.

name: 上
reading: o=ショウ_shou;ジョウ_jou||k=うえ_ue;あ.げる_ageru;かみ_kami
mnemonic: There's a toe above ground. Look at it.
